pageProps.title: Samsung website
pageProps.description: I maintain and update Samsung.com/hk with my senior frontend developer. Make sure Hong Kong version is match of global or other area version, and no any bug for the Samsung.com website. We will using basic Html, CSS and Javascript, and check different area version makesure the user expereice is the best. Sometime, we will add some litte functions and some changes for our Hong Kong version.
